title: In The Eden
alternative_title: In the Eden ; [비애] 인 디 에덴 ; イン・ジ・エデン ; 인 디 에덴
status: In the Eden ; [비애] 인 디 에덴 ; イン・ジ・エデン ; 인 디 에덴
description:
Description :
        I liked women's lingerie from very young, and now that I'm an adult, I love secretly wearing women's lingerie at all time, despite being a priest.
One day, my secret hobby was found out by Kirihito, a glass craftsman who came to repair the church stained glass. Fortunately Kirihito didn't spill my secret and taught me lust.

Yoh and Kirihito's, from "Haitoku no Niwa", first encounter and relationship debut.
